name: Bloodline (itch)
description:
Bloodline is a game made in three hours (actually, two hours, fifty-eight minutes and forty-seven seconds plus Unity configuration and build time) for Trijam #62.

Playing as your favourite virus, you have to try to infect as many healthy cells as you can, while avoiding the medicine currently in the bloodstream. However, the particles in the blood are going to make it harder to see, so be careful!

Controls:

  • WASD (or arrows) to move.

Credits:

Every graphic asset has been made by me. The music is "Gravitation", by RuniversE and licensed by me.

The sound effect is "Body Thud", an open source SFX by Kane53126.
